page.title: 11Helion's Bumpstead.
page.content: {Helion's Bumpstead}is a small village 3 miles away from Steeple Bumpstead.It has got a{post office,Gospel hall,pub, {church,}and a{village hall.}The gospel hall has family services and Treasure seekers which teaches you about God.It is run by the Plymouth Brethren. The pub is called The Three Horseshoes and they serve meals there.The pub has got two bars. In one room there are arcade games. In the Village Hall they have got a grand piano and a stage.The post office is also a village shop. Mr and Mrs Tuttlebury have lived there for 15 years and Mr Tuttlebury grows strawberries.The church is a flint and brick church,whose date is pre 13th century. Some of it is 14th and 16th century and a porch was added in Victorian times.There are some attractive rural lanes leading into the village and{Water Lane}to the
